appDescription: Comparative analysis between GitLab and GitHub for version control platform migration

overview.title: Comparative Analysis of Git Platforms
overview.subtitle: Detailed comparison between GitLab and GitHub for SHMS modernization

recommendation.title: Development Team Strategic Recommendation
recommendation.subtitle: GitHub Enterprise Cloud
recommendation.description: Proceeding with GitHub Enterprise Cloud represents the most balanced strategic decision. It maximizes the investment already made, offers proven superiority of AI tools for .NET modernization, and eliminates operational overhead identified by the internal team.
recommendation.basisDescription: This analysis was conducted by the development team, considering technical, operational and strategic aspects of the migration, focusing on the continuity of the project already started and the modernization needs of SHMS.

deploymentExplanation.selfHosted: Installation on dedicated VM in Oracle Cloud (4 vCPU, 16GB RAM, 100GB storage)
deploymentExplanation.cloud: Managed service by the platform (GitHub.com or GitLab.com)

costs.tooltip: Click on column headers to sort the data.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence Resources
ai.subtitle: Detailed analysis of available AI tools
ai.copilotDescription: Advanced AI tools that accelerate modernization and code improvements

migrationAssisted.title: Assisted Migration .NET Framework → .NET Core
migrationAssisted.description: GitHub Copilot offers specialized tools to modernize .NET Framework applications to .NET Core, including:
migrationAssisted.impact: Significantly reduces the time required for manual migration of SHMS code.

unitTests.title: Automated Unit Test Generation
unitTests.description: Intelligent creation of unit tests based on existing code context:
unitTests.impact: Significantly accelerates test creation for SHMS.

codeAgent.title: Intelligent Code Agent
codeAgent.description: Delegate complete tasks to the GitHub Copilot agent that plans, writes, tests and iterates code automatically using GitHub Actions.
codeAgent.impact: Accelerates development of complex functionalities through intelligent task automation.

multipleModels.title: Multiple AI Models
multipleModels.description: Access to different AI models (Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4.1, Gemini 2.0) according to the specific task needs.

codeReview.title: Automated Code Review
codeReview.description: Automated code analysis before human review, detecting hidden bugs, vulnerabilities and suggesting improvements.
codeReview.benefit: Significantly reduces code review time and improves SHMS code quality.

intelligentSecurity.title: Intelligent Security
intelligentSecurity.description: Advanced filters that detect vulnerabilities, duplicate code and insecure patterns in real-time during development.

comparison.title: AI Ecosystems Comparison
comparison.codeAgent: Code agent for automatic task delegation
comparison.automatedReview: Automated code review with advanced bug detection

recommendation.title: AI Resources Recommendation
recommendation.subtitle: GitHub Copilot Enterprise for .NET Modernization
recommendation.description: For the specific context of SHMS and .NET Framework modernization, GitHub Copilot offers decisive technical advantages. With equivalent prices to GitLab Duo Pro, its specialized tools for .NET migration, automated test generation and Visual Studio integration provide superior ROI for code modernization compared to GitLab Duo, which focuses on DevSecOps.
recommendation.technicalDescription: Analysis based on GitHub Copilot's superiority for .NET development, native integration with Azure services, and specific tools for legacy application modernization - critical factors for the success of SHMS evolution.

scope.title: IS Analysis Scope
scope.description: This analysis focuses on On-Premises solutions. Cloud options were not evaluated by the Information Security team.
scope.documentDescription: Access the detailed technical analysis from the Information Security team with all criteria, evaluations and specific recommendations.

githubES.title: GitHub Enterprise Server
githubES.note: For GitHub Enterprise Server to be comparable to GitLab EE in security, contracting the "Advanced Security" add-on is essential. Without it, the platform does not meet several critical security criteria.

scenario1.title: Scenario 1: Maximum Security Priority
scenario1.description: GitLab EE Ultimate offers the most robust set of integrated security tools.

scenario2.title: Scenario 2: Cost vs Security Balance
scenario2.description: GitLab CE with external security tools can be a viable option.

common.aiWarning: AI resources NOT available in Self-hosted solutions
